Leisure in the green surroundings

Green paths and parks in the middle of the city make Bremerhaven a nice place to live.

Don't miss a visit to the unique Castle of Willows in the Fitness and Wellness Park Speckenbüttel located in the north of the city. Or during a long walk discover the Bürgerpark, which is situated in the district Geestemünde and lies directly behind the main train station. You can even enjoy a relaxing pedal boot tour on the boating lake there.

The green areas in the Seaside City offer relaxation, a colorful flora and many sporting possibilities. Go for a jog in the park, take pleasure in frolicking children during a family outing or take your dog for a walk on Sundays.

You even have the possibility to barbeque there. Should you be looking for peace and tranquillity in order to relax during your lunch break the city's parks are just the right places to be. The unique lighting along the green paths offer hobby photographers the right atmosphere for that very special snapshot.

Boat Pond & Boat Rental in the Public Park

Pure nature at the Public park

Recreation in Nature

Castle of Willows Fitness and Wellness Park of Speckenbüttel

According to the design of the architect Marcel Kalberers, a castle was built out of huge pasture bundles. A green, lively and growing castle of willow trees, which invites you to relax in the Fitness and Wellness Park of Speckenbüttel.

Recreation in Nature

Citizen's Grove

Since 2010 there is a citizen's grove (Bürgerhain) in Bremerhaven. The idea was initiated by a group of citizens called the „Grünen Kreis“ (green circle) and was implemented together with the Bremerhaven park department.

Recreation in Nature

"Fish the Cache" and "Cache the Port" Bremerhaven

The Harbor Worlds and the Shop Window Fishery Harbor become connected

Recreation in Nature

Fitness and Wellness Park of Speckenbüttel

A park with a recreational area of approx. 70 ha in the Northern part of the city

Open Air Museum Speckenbüttel
